function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate and inaccurate COVID-19 information in literature","Impact":"Misinformation and lack of understanding of COVID-19 and its impact","Mitigation":"Verification and validation of information from trusted sources","Technologies":"Data analysis tools for verifying the accuracy of information","People":"General public, healthcare professionals, policymakers","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Use of grey literature in the study","Impact":"Reliability and accuracy of information may be compromised","Mitigation":"Cross-referencing with peer-reviewed literature, validation of sources","Technologies":"Digital libraries, online databases for peer-reviewed literature","People":"Researchers, policymakers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, academic organizations"},{"Description":"Language limitation to English","Impact":"Exclusion of non-English literature may lead to limited perspectives","Mitigation":"Translation services, collaboration with multilingual researchers","Technologies":"Translation software, multilingual databases","People":"Researchers, policymakers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, academic organizations"}]}
